attributes.action: urge the Queen not to comandeer the Hebridean Princess
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who had booked a cruise on the Hebridean Princess in July have been turned off the ship because the Queen has decided that she wants it. It is improper to behave like this, The Queen should apologise and plan a later trip correctly as the original passengers had done.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
